content.query:
CREATE DATABASE datascience;
GO

USE datascience;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA raw AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39345ghJ#KL95909234nl0zBe'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '<INSERT_SAS>'
GO

USE datascience;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE UPExternalDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = '<INSERT_STORAGE_ACCOUNT',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
)
